mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expenseRequests (amount, userId, createdAt) values (#{expenseRequest.amount}, #{userId}, #{expenseRequest.createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT expenseRequest.id as id, expenseRequest.name as name, policy.id as policyId, policy.maxAmount as policyMaxAmount, policy.createdAt as policyCreatedAt FROM categories as expenseRequest left join policies as policy on expenseRequest.id = policy.expenseRequestId where expenseRequest.id = #{id} order by policyCreatedAt DESC LIMIT 1
